Subject: Re: A message from an old friend to drill bit
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Scorponok shifts uneasely around the new large robots. "Scorponok
Terrororize" he shouts as his body shifts and rearanges to form his
humanoid form. He looks nervously to Darkfate, then back to the new robots.
"I am Scorponok" he stammers "one of Darkfate's troops" he finishes trying
to calm himself.
